answers.author: Joseph Thompson
answers.text:
Ms. Williamson,
The City of Rockville has a thorough development review process. They published a comprehensive “Development Review Manual” after the adoption of their revised zoning ordinance. I believe the manual is available on their website. If you have specific questions, I encourage you to contact Mr. Bobby Ray, Principal Planner, who heads up the development review section of the city’s planning department. Bobby’s e-mail address is: bray@rockvillemd.gov
Joe

answers.author: Sylvia Carrillo
answers.text:
The City of Corpus Christi has undergone a "process improvement effort" recently in their development review process. While painful at first, it's paying big dividends now. You may email me to discuss if you'd like at sylviaar@cctexas.com or visit our webpage at www.cctexas.com/developmentservices

author: Carroll Williamson
text: I am looking for documented information about other municipalities' development review process.  Does anyone have a well-run process and are willing to answer some questions about it?  Thanks for your help and look forward to hearing from you.
title: Development Review Process
